data.description:
Toy Monsters üß∏ is a mixed-reality tabletop tower defense game inspired by other classic titles in the genre. Built from the ground up with hand tracking and mixed reality passthrough in mind.

Toy Monsters is currently in Early Access but will be graduating from App Lab soon, expanding on the current version, and upon graduation, defend yourself against the hordes across 3 worlds, 33+ levels and bonus levels, bosses, and an endless mode.

As you progress through the levels, you'll unlock new toys with unique special powers. You can enhance your toys with magical potions and use crystal power to unleash magic beams from your hands, transform your fingers into flamethrowers, and more.

Defend against hordes of invading monsters by strategically placing magical toy defenders powered by star power. You will encounter a range of enemies, each with their unique abilities and weaknesses.

Features: 

‚ùáÔ∏è Defend against hordes of incoming monsters

‚ùáÔ∏è Unlock new defenders and special abilities, like magic beams and bombs

‚ùáÔ∏è Experience the freedom of playing with just your hands, without the need for controllers

‚ùáÔ∏è Challenge yourself to achieve a high score on each level

‚ùáÔ∏è  Play from anywhere in your environment, whether standing up or comfortably seated on your couch

‚ùáÔ∏è Enjoy an evolving gameplay experience, with regular updates and new features

Toy Monsters is playable with hand-tracking and mixed reality, supporting optional controller support, and a fully immersive option.

changelog.change_log:
Graphical overhaul - new visuals for enemies and defenders (tank, firebreathing dinosaur, and more)

Interactive game map with level progression

Improved tile-based game board with door portals to defend and orcs' gate

New UI and improved interactions

New tutorial and wizard companions
